name: Sodium carbonate
desc: Sodium carbonate (also known as washing soda, soda ash and soda crystals, and in the monohydrate form as crystal carbonate), Na2CO3, is the water-soluble sodium salt of carbonic acid.
Other names: Soda ash, Washing soda, Soda crystals
